senses.sense_definition: In a manner that is severe, austere, or stoically inflexible, resembling the character of the Roman statesman Cato.

examples.text: The judge sat <w>catonically</w> on the bench, refusing to show any emotion despite the emotional testimony.
He adhered <w>catonically</w> to his principles of frugality, ignoring the lavish trends of his peers.
